ability.Heat Vent: This Pokemon takes 50% less damage from Water and Grass type moves.
ability.Lava Storm: This Pokemon releases either a Sleeping Gas, Poison Gas, or Burning Gas after using a Fire-type move. Each gas has a 30% chance to force the target into sleep, poison, or burn status.

Lava Beam.effect: Has a 20% chance to burn the target.

Rock Slide.effect: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
